entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
